inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: echocardiographic criteria: aortic valve (AV) effective orifice area (EOA) of < 1 cm2, mean AV gradient of > 40 mmHg, or AV peak systolic velocity of > 4.0 m/s

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: dyspnea in NYHA-class II or greater, angina pectoris, or syncope

inclusion.criterion: survival time more than one year
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: aortic valve is a congenital unicuspid or bicuspid valve, or is noncalcified
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe degenerative high flow AS and is symptomatic from the AS. No contraindications for open chest surgery mentioned.
